response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the fridge as per the first subtask. The next step is to take the bacon out of the fridge. The bacon is currently inside the fridge and the robot has a tray in its inventory.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge.
(2) Take the bacon out of the fridge.
(3) Cook the bacon on the stove.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    bacon = registry(env,"bacon_150")
    EasyGrasp(robot, bacon)
    donothing(env)
